definitions.text: superior development of one side of the body
the state that exists when one person or group has power over another
examples: her apparent dominance of her husband was really her attempt to make him pay attention to her

definitions.text: the organic phenomenon in which one of a pair of alleles present in a genotype is expressed in the phenotype and the other allele of the pair is not
the power or right to give orders or make decisions
examples: he has the authority to issue warrants
deputies are given authorization to make arrests
a place of potency in the state
